game.title: The Lost Temple
game.objective: Retrieve the ancient artifact from the lost temple
game.description: An ancient temple has been discovered deep in the jungle, and rumors are circulating about a powerful artifact hidden within its walls. Retrieve the artifact and bring it back to the village elder.
game.reward: 100 gold coins, +20 reputation with the village

tasks.objective: Clear the temple entrance of hostile creatures
tasks.description: Fight off the giant spiders and venomous snakes guarding the temple entrance.

tasks.objective: Solve the ancient puzzle to unlock the inner sanctum
tasks.description: Use your knowledge of ancient languages to decipher the cryptic symbols on the walls and unlock the door to the inner sanctum.

tasks.objective: Retrieve the artifact from the treasure chamber
tasks.description: Grab the ancient relic from the pedestal in the treasure chamber, but beware of deadly traps and puzzles protecting it.
